channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 15:21 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky Rivtsa- Laivpets Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 15:21 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky Rivtsa- Laivpets Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 15:20 Air alert in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.

item.title: 🟠 15:20 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 15:20 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291#Kupyanskyi_rayon This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
